00023 using System;
00024 using System.IO;
00025 using System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary;
00026 using System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap;
00027 using System.Text;
00028 using System.Xml.Serialization;
00029 #endregion

00031 namespace Utilities
00032 {
00036     public static class Serialization
00037     {
00038         #region Public Static Functions
00039

00041 
00042

00044         public static void ObjectToBinary(object Object, out byte[] Output)
00045         {
00046             try
00047             {
00048                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream())
00049                 {
00050                     BinaryFormatter Formatter = new BinaryFormatter();
00051                     Formatter.Serialize(Stream, Object);
00052                     Stream.Seek(0, 0);
00053                     Output = Stream.ToArray();
00054                 }
00055             }
00056             catch (Exception a)
00057             {
00058                 throw a;
00059             }
00060         }
00061 
00068         public static void BinaryToObject<T>(byte[] Binary,out T Object)
00069         {
00070             try
00071             {
00072                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream())
00073                 {
00074                     Stream.Write(Binary, 0, Binary.Length);
00075                     Stream.Seek(0, 0);
00076                     BinaryFormatter Formatter = new BinaryFormatter();
00077                     Object = (T)Formatter.Deserialize(Stream);
00078                 }
00079             }
00080             catch (Exception a)
00081             {
00082                 throw a;
00083             }
00084         }
00085 
00092         public static string ObjectToXML(object Object, string FileName)
00093         {
00094             try
00095             {
00096                 string XML = ObjectToXML(Object);
00097                 FileManager.SaveFile(XML, FileName);
00098                 return XML;
00099             }
00100             catch (Exception a)
00101             {
00102                 throw a;
00103             }
00104         }
00105 
00111         public static string ObjectToXML(object Object)
00112         {
00113             if (Object == null)
00114             {
00115                 throw new ArgumentException("Object can not be null");
00116             }
00117             try
00118             {
00119                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream())
00120                 {
00121                     XmlSerializer Serializer = new XmlSerializer(Object.GetType());
00122                     Serializer.Serialize(Stream, Object);
00123                     Stream.Flush();
00124                     return UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetString(Stream.GetBuffer(), 0, (int)Stream.Position);
00125                 }
00126             }
00127             catch (Exception a)
00128             {
00129                 throw a;
00130             }
00131         }
00132 
00138         public static void XMLToObject<T>(string FileName, out T Object)
00139         {
00140             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(FileName))
00141             {
00142                 throw new ArgumentException("File name can not be null/empty");
00143             }
00144             if (!FileManager.FileExists(FileName))
00145             {
00146                 throw new ArgumentException("File does not exist");
00147             }
00148             try
00149             {
00150                 string FileContent = FileManager.GetFileContents(FileName);
00151                 Object = XMLToObject<T>(FileContent);
00152             }
00153             catch (Exception a)
00154             {
00155                 throw a;
00156             }
00157         }
00158 
00165         public static T XMLToObject<T>(string XML)
00166         {
00167             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(XML))
00168             {
00169                 throw new ArgumentException("XML can not be null/empty");
00170             }
00171             try
00172             {
00173                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(XML)))
00174                 {
00175                     XmlSerializer Serializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(T));
00176                     return (T)Serializer.Deserialize(Stream);
00177                 }
00178             }
00179             catch (Exception a)
00180             {
00181                 throw a;
00182             }
00183         }
00184 
00191         public static T SOAPToObject<T>(string SOAP)
00192         {
00193             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(SOAP))
00194             {
00195                 throw new ArgumentException("SOAP can not be null/empty");
00196             }
00197             try
00198             {
00199                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(SOAP)))
00200                 {
00201                     SoapFormatter Formatter = new SoapFormatter();
00202                     return (T)Formatter.Deserialize(Stream);
00203                 }
00204             }
00205             catch (Exception a)
00206             {
00207                 throw a;
00208             }
00209         }
00210 
00216         public static string ObjectToSOAP(object Object)
00217         {
00218             if (Object == null)
00219             {
00220                 throw new ArgumentException("Object can not be null");
00221             }
00222             try
00223             {
00224                 using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream())
00225                 {
00226                     SoapFormatter Serializer = new SoapFormatter();
00227                     Serializer.Serialize(Stream, Object);
00228                     Stream.Flush();
00229                     return UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetString(Stream.GetBuffer(), 0, (int)Stream.Position);
00230                 }
00231             }
00232             catch (Exception a)
00233             {
00234                 throw a;
00235             }
00236         }

00238     }
